Lawn bowls at the 2014 Commonwealth Games

response: Jamie competed for England in the women's pairs at the 2014 Commonwealth Games  where she won a silver medal with Natalie Melmore.

link_mentions.page: Lawn bowls at the 2014 Commonwealth Games – Women's pairs

response: In 2015, he married fellow bowls international Natalie Melmore. In 2020, he joined the Bowls England staff as a its Membership Register Project Officer.

In the 2010 Commonwealth Games she won her qualifying group with a perfect 10-0 win record and 20-0 set record before losing to Natalie Melmore in the semi finals bringing her eight-year reign as champion to an end. She was also the flag bearer for the Malaysian team during the 2010 games.
